title: Registration
acceptTermsLabel: I accept the terms and conditions of the website by registering.
existingUserMessage: Already have an account? Log in.
registrationSuccessMessage: Registration was successful! You are now logged in.

name.min: Name must be at least 2 characters

surname.min: Surname must consist of two words with at least two characters each

password.min: Password must be at least 6 characters
password.matches: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number

acceptTerms.oneOf: You must accept the terms and conditions
